#summary How to install v5 and above
#labels Featured


= Installation in the New Aardwolf MUSHclient =
 * Download the Aardwolf Client from http://www.aardwolf.com and unzip it
 * Download from the [http://code.google.com/p/bastmush/downloads/list Downloads] page.
 * Unzip into your plugins directory
 * Use File->Plugins to Add the plugins you want to use

= Upgrading from v4 =
 * I would recommend moving data from v4 into the new Aardwolf MUSHclient

== Process ==
 * Download the new Aardwolf MUSHclient from http://www.aardwolf.com
 * Unzip the new client and start it, connect to Aardwolf, logout and close the client

=== Moving data ===
 * Copy and overwrite
  * all files in OldMUSHInstallDir/logs to NewMUSHInstallDir/logs
  * Aardwolf_bookmarks.db and Aardwolf.db from the OldMUSHInstallDir to NewMUSHInstallDir
